page.title: 12THE LIFE OF AN 8 YEAR OLD
page.content: I am called Emily Oldfield.I live in a small village called Denton.I like running,I like playing the recorder and piano.I wear dresses, skirts, trousers and tracksuits.My Mum works as a teacher in a secondary school. She teaches art. When she comes home from work she likes to sit down with a cup of tea. My dad loves gardening. He does not work in the garden on working days because he gets tired but he works in the garden on free days. He works as a teacher in a polytechnic. My sister Sally loves reading.She keeps reading books she likes over and over again even if they are too young for her. She goes to the same school as me. My grandma lives with us as well.She likes plants as well as my dad but she has indoor ones because they are easier to get to.
